issue.title: [CF 1115] fill bar up + artifical maximum
issue.body:
Hey,
I think it would be nice if you could use those two features together

Background:
I use your great addon for cooldowns.
When the Time is over 4 seconds, i have it faded out.
When it hits 4 seconds Cooldown left, i let it fade in and display a timer + a filling bar.
When the spell is ready, i have a nice huge annoying color on my screen to tell me that i should use the spell again.

Thank you for your great work


> Posted by CurseForge user tearx | Imported from CurseForge issue #1115 | Raw

comments.body:
It wouldn't work like what you're describing - the bar would fill up during the first 4 seconds of the spell going on cooldown (when you have the icon faded out), and then would stay filled until the spell was used again. It wouldn't fill up over the last 4 seconds of the cooldown.

Edited Apr 29, 2015
